name: twc
description: Typed Web Components compiles pure TypeScript classes to native Polymer modules.

scripts.cover: ts-node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover -e .ts  -x "*.d.ts" -x "*.spec.ts" _mocha -- --compiler ts-node/register -R spec tests/tests.spec.ts
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover -- --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.test: npm run lint && mocha --require ts-node/register --ui bdd tests/tests.spec.ts
